name: Rooted (Studio PaperWind)
description:
Phoebe wakes up one night in a pitch-black house. Her grandmother is nowhere to be seen. The world that awaits her outside has been segmented into paper isles attached to the ground by long, long roots.

A tree monster clinging to the bottom of the yard offers to help her find her grandmother. He allows Phoebe to command his powers using fairy circles scattered throughout the world.

Solve puzzles by moving and aligning isles to create a path for yourself.

Platform through a segmented papery landscape.

Use the environment to defeat the cursed monster Halmony who is rooted to the end of your journey.
